    • Constructor Detail

      • GameState

        public GameState(int numPlayers,
         int whoseTurn,
         java.util.List<Card> deck,
         java.util.List<Card> discard,
         int[] sestertii,
         int[] victoryPoints,
         java.util.List<Card>[] playersHands,
         Card[][] playersCardsOnField)
        Constructor to build the game state out of required components.
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - the number of players in the game.
        whoseTurn - the current players turn.
        deck - a list of the cards in the board deck.
        discard - a list of cards within the board discard pile.
        sestertii - the amount of money for each player in the game.
        victoryPoints - the victory points for each player in the game.
        playersHands - a list of cards in each players hand.
        playersCardsOnField - a list of the cards currently on field.
